Throw your mainhand shield at an enemy. The shield can ricochet up to 3 times within [1], dealing [2] damage and restoring [3] and [4] for each enemy hit.
The shield then returns, restoring an additional amount of armor.
Shield Mastery I
If 3 targets are hit, restore [5] and [6] to allies within 8m.

Bolster your defenses, gaining a [1]% boost to your armor values until your next turn.
When hunkering down, you will be Grounded and be unable to move, while becoming a priority target for enemies.
Critical hit damage taken is reduced by 50%.

Dual Shields Mastery III
Slam the target in an Iron Maiden, dealing [1].
If the target is in a Shield Prison, deal an extra [2] and apply Dazed.
Applies Bleeding, and Ruptures Bleeding targets for [3].
A hardy blow with your shield that deals [1] and has a chance to daze the target.

Dual Shields Mastery I
Cover a target character remotely for 3 turns, redirecting 50% of the damage they take to you.
The first time the target gets attacked, rush to their position and counter-attack the attacker for [1], and grant the target temporary damage resistance.

Dual Shields Mastery II
Encase the target in a hardened shell, removing them from combat for 1 turn.
Allies gain +2 AP upon being freed.
